reviewText: The story is about a rich heiress (Rekha) whose son is the new guy Tendral. He is a good-for-nothing guy who spends his time drinking and making merry with friends and `mama' (Vivek). In fact, it this `mama' who sorts out all his problems. Together they go to a village to see a girl under the orders of Rekha, who feels that marriage would make Tendral a responsible man.
